page.title: 08A Family near Monks Kirby
page.content: I am{Christine Broughton}and I am ten years old.I have one sister called Claire who is thirteen years old.Often we go to Wales for a holiday and to see our Grandparents.My mum and my dad both have jobs.My mum works at {Brockhurst Middle School,}she helps to cook and serve the food to the children when they come for dinner. When they have finished she helps the other dinner ladies to wash up. We live in a house in{Brinklow}which is three miles away from Monks Kirby. We have no pets but I would like a dog.My auntie and uncle live just along the road from us so we see them quite often.We have a car a fridge and a freezer.
